name: Chuck C

text: Friendly staff but location is a little hidden away.

text: PIZZA HUT HAS ALWAYS BEEN THE GO TO FOR PIZZA.. THEY HAVE BEEN MAKING PIZZA SEEMS LIKE SINCE I WAS A LITTLE BOY 50 YEARS AGO.. GIT YOU SUM TODAY.. TONIGHT.. DURING THE WEEK OR WEEKENDS.. NOW GO..!!

text: My order was wrong and Miss Harley was so helpful in getting everything taken care of so easily. Love that.

text: Normally Pizza Hut is very good with service. Tonight however is a big disappointment. Dominos and Giovanni‚Äôs it is from now on.

name: Jennifer McNiel
text: Usually good service, but tonight- not so much.  I placed an order online and then immediately called the store to add a personal pan pizza (not available for online order).  I was immediately put on hold.  Stayed on hold so long, I hung up ‚Ä¶More

name: Wayne Buxton
text: Worse pizza hut I've ever had and I love pizza.

name: Darcus Jackson
text: Very friendly staff! This Pizza Hut is clean. I have never had an issue with my call in orders. Delivery area is limited but I understand because the safety of the employee is important. The pizza is always amazing and the Chicken Alfredo pasta is the best!

name: Robert Anthony
text: Not sure what a going on with pizza hut tonight. Normally fantastic service & everything. Tonight, food was nearly 40mins late. No apologies and there was a freakin bug on pizza when open up the box!

name: Earnest Williams
text: Mannn THE Last two times I went (I just left) that tall white younger looking dude that made my pizzas is AWESOME!! !!  SEEMS LIKE HE ACTUALLY TAKES TIME AND PAYS ATTENTION TO WHAT HE IS DOING. I LOVE THIN CRUST, THE CRUST WAS CRISPY AT THE EDGE, LIGHTLY BUTTERED AND STILL HAD A SOFT BITE TO IT HE NEEDS A PROMOTION!!!

name: Dena Drennan
text: Carry out. Great job taking order. Very friendly and helped me get a special. Pizzas are usually better than what they were on this trip.  They lacked enough sauce.

name: Dale Thomasson
text: The customer service was awesome . The new deals they have are better than Papa John's and Domino's Pizza

name: Sue Anthony
text: They have new location across the street from the old restaurant. Much easier to get in and out of. Not to mention this new delivery driver that gets your order correct and prompt service. Tip well deserved.

name: James Crawford
text: Small but kinda nice. Good pizza, not as big of a place as it use to be, I like the new building they are in.

name: Cris O.
text: Pizza was delicious and really good service

name: AMANDA MITCHELL
text: Love. They sometimes  do the 5$ menu on pizzas&sides. I can afford  a Friday  night pizza night for my family  of 5.

name: Cheree Goolsby
text: Online ordering was very simple to do. Pizza was very good. Breadsticks were a little too done for my taste but we're still good

name: Jeremiah Liscum
text: First time customer ordered delivery and it took them an hour and 45 minutes to get here, and when they did they forgot my wings and my pizza was cold. Called the store to talk to a manager and she didnt offer any compensation for my time. They come back with my wings and they are cold old and poorly seasoned.

name: Pam Meyer
text: Service was terrible, eating area was dirty and employees/cooks not wearing glove.  Way over priced

name: Holly Duncan
text: Literally the worst pizza Hut location I've ever experienced. Every time I order it has taken 2+ hours to receive my order, and that's after I call and ask why I haven't received my order. My advice is just stick to Domino's or locally owned pizza/wings place because this pizza hut ABSOLUTELY SUCKS.

name: Michael Richardson
text: Friendly staff. Great classic pizza hut food. We love it for family pizza night.

name: Christina Robinson
text: The new location is tiny. I liked being able to sit at the old location. No table service offered now. Mainly takeout.

name: paul santorello
text: Food and service are always great, but pretty irritated that after delivering to my house on almost a weekly basis for the last 8 years they decided that I'm now "outside of their delivery range and there is nothing they can do about it" yet saw a neighbor get delivery a few days ago....

name: Averion Axel
text: DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS PIZZA HUT! The driver DALE who delivered the pizza wrote his own tip on my receipt for $7!!!! I called to complain and the manager took his side and was rude from the beginning !!! DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE!!! DALE is a theif!!!

name: Carol P
text: Easy-to-use website for ordering and the food was very good.
